faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about automation
faq.a1: Automation involves connecting your tools and applications so they work together without human intervention. For example: automatically syncing CRM leads with your email tool, generating daily reports, or notifying your team on Slack when a sale is made.
faq.q2: Which automation tools do you use?
faq.a2: We primarily work with n8n, Make (formerly Integromat), and Zapier. We choose the most suitable tool based on your needs, budget, and existing systems. For complex requirements, we also develop custom solutions with Python or Node.js.
faq.q3: How long does it take to automate my processes?
faq.a3: A simple workflow can be set up in 1-2 days. Complex automations with multiple integrations typically take 1-3 weeks. We always start by identifying your priority processes for quick results.
faq.q4: What is the return on investment (ROI)?
faq.a4: Most of our clients see positive ROI within 2-4 months through time saved. For example: automating 10 hours/week of repetitive tasks represents 40-50 hours/month saved. We calculate projected ROI during our free initial audit.
faq.q5: Can my current tools be automated?
faq.a5: Very likely! Modern tools (CRM, ERP, marketing tools, accounting, etc.) have APIs enabling integration. Even older tools can often be connected via email, webhooks, or CSV files. We conduct a free technical audit to validate feasibility.
faq.q6: What happens if my workflows break down?
faq.a6: We implement 24/7 monitoring with automatic alerts. In case of errors, we're notified instantly and intervene quickly. All our maintenance packages include priority support with guaranteed SLAs.
faq.a7: No, automation frees your teams from low-value repetitive tasks so they can focus on strategic activities requiring creativity and human judgment. The goal is to increase productivity, not replace people.
faq.q8: How much does process automation cost?
faq.a8: Pricing varies by complexity: simple workflows from €500-1500, medium automations €2000-5000, complex projects €5000-15000. We also offer recurring monthly packages to continuously manage and improve your automations.
faq.q9: Can I modify my workflows myself afterward?
faq.a9: Absolutely! We include comprehensive training so your team can adjust and maintain workflows. We document everything and remain available for support. You're never stuck if you want to evolve your processes.
faq.q10: How do I get started with automation?
faq.a10: Contact us for a free 30-minute audit. We identify your most time-consuming processes, estimate potential time savings, and propose a prioritized automation plan. You receive a detailed proposal within 48 hours with projected ROI.

automation.hero_subtitle: Eliminate repetitive tasks and focus on what truly matters with our custom automation solutions
automation.overview_p1: Process automation connects your tools and applications so they work together seamlessly, without manual intervention. Imagine your CRM leads automatically synced with your email tool, invoices generated and sent without lifting a finger, or your team instantly notified on Slack when important events occur.
automation.overview_p2: At AutomX, we specialize in creating intelligent workflows using n8n, Make, Zapier, and custom solutions. We transform your time-consuming processes into automated systems that save you dozens of hours every week.
automation.overview_who_desc: SMBs, startups, and entrepreneurs looking to scale without increasing manual workload. Marketing, sales, and operations teams overwhelmed by repetitive tasks.
automation.benefit1_desc: Save 10-30 hours per week by automating repetitive tasks
automation.benefit2_desc: Automated workflows execute tasks with perfect precision
automation.benefit3_desc: Your teams focus on high-value tasks
automation.benefit4_desc: Your processes run continuously, even nights and weekends
automation.benefit5_desc: Visible return on investment from the first month
automation.process_step1_desc: We identify your most time-consuming processes and calculate potential ROI
automation.process_step2_desc: We document your current workflows and design optimal automations
automation.process_step3_desc: Workflow development with n8n, Make, Zapier, or custom solutions
automation.process_step4_desc: Complete validation with real cases to ensure reliability
automation.process_step5_desc: Progressive production rollout with real-time monitoring
automation.process_step6_desc: Knowledge transfer and ongoing support for autonomy
automation.pricing_subtitle: Transparent pricing tailored to your needs
automation.pricing_enterprise_desc: Custom solutions, multiple integrations, priority support
automation.faq_a1: Simple workflow: 2-5 days. Complex automations: 2-4 weeks depending on number of integrations.
automation.faq_a2: Yes! We train you for autonomy. Most tools (n8n, Make) have easy-to-use visual interfaces.
automation.faq_q3: What happens if there's a failure?
automation.faq_a3: 24/7 monitoring with automatic alerts. Our team intervenes quickly. Priority support included.
automation.faq_a4: Most clients save 10-30 hours/week. Positive ROI in 2-4 months depending on complexity.
automation.faq_a5: Probably! We conduct a free technical audit to validate feasibility. Over 1000 apps can be integrated.
automation.cta_subtitle: Save dozens of hours every week

web.hero_subtitle: Create modern, performant, and scalable digital experiences that generate measurable results
web.overview_title: Why a Modern Website Makes the Difference
web.overview_p1: Your website is often the first point of contact with your customers. It must be fast, beautiful, functional, and optimized for conversion. We create web experiences that not only impress visually but also generate concrete results: more leads, more sales, more engagement.
web.overview_p2: Specialized in modern technologies (React, Next.js, Astro, TypeScript), we build performant, SEO-friendly websites and web applications perfectly adapted to mobile. Every line of code is designed for performance, maintainability, and scalability.
web.overview_who_desc: Companies looking to modernize their online presence, startups launching their product, e-commerce sites aiming for growth, or organizations needing custom web applications.
web.benefits_title: Why Invest in a Modern Website
web.benefit1_desc: Load times < 2s, Lighthouse scores 95+, smooth user experience
web.benefit2_desc: Architecture designed for SEO, better Google ranking
web.benefit3_desc: Flawless experience on mobile, tablet, and desktop
web.benefit4_desc: UX/UI designed to turn visitors into customers
web.benefit5_desc: Clean, documented code that's easy to evolve
web.benefit6_desc: Security best practices, protection against vulnerabilities
web.process_step1_desc: Analysis of your goals, target audience, and competitors
web.process_step3_desc: Clean code with React, Next.js, Astro, and TypeScript
web.faq_q1: How long to create a website?
web.faq_a1: Showcase site: 4-6 weeks. E-commerce: 8-12 weeks. Complex application: 3-6 months depending on features.
web.faq_a2: Yes! We integrate a CMS (Sanity, Strapi, headless WordPress) with complete training.
web.faq_q3: Will the site be optimized for Google?
web.faq_a3: Absolutely. Impeccable technical SEO, optimal speed, semantic structure. We aim for Lighthouse scores 95+.
web.faq_a4: We recommend and configure modern hosting (Vercel, Netlify). Included in some packages or billed separately.
web.faq_q5: Can I see examples of sites?
web.faq_a5: Check our portfolio in the Projects section. We also share our process and concrete results.
web.cta_title: Ready to Launch Your Web Project?
web.cta_subtitle: Let's create a web experience that converts

data.hero_subtitle: Harness the power of your data with intelligent dashboards and actionable insights
data.overview_p1: Your data contains treasures of information, but you need to know how to extract and visualize it effectively. We transform your raw data into clear dashboards and actionable insights that guide your strategic decisions.
data.overview_p2: Whether you need to analyze your sales performance, track your operational KPIs, or predict trends, we create custom solutions with Python, SQL, Power BI, and the best modern analytics technologies.
data.overview_who_desc: Companies wanting to leverage data for data-driven decisions, marketing/sales teams looking to optimize performance, executives needing clear and automated reports.
data.benefit1_desc: Base your strategic choices on reliable and up-to-date data
data.benefit2_desc: Identify patterns and opportunities invisible to the naked eye
data.benefit3_desc: Track your KPIs in real-time and act quickly
data.benefit4_desc: Identify what works and eliminate what doesn't
data.benefit5_desc: Anticipate future trends with predictive models
data.benefit6_desc: Reports generated automatically, no more time lost in Excel
data.process_step1_desc: Inventory of your data sources and quality assessment
data.process_step3_desc: Creation of analysis models adapted to your objectives
data.process_step4_desc: Design of intuitive dashboards with Power BI, Tableau, or custom solutions
data.process_step6_desc: Automatic report updates and continuous monitoring
data.pricing_subtitle: Solutions adapted to your data volume
data.faq_q1: Which data sources can you analyze?
data.faq_a1: CRM, ERP, databases, Excel/CSV files, Google Analytics, social media, APIs... Virtually all sources.
data.faq_a2: First dashboard: 1-2 weeks. Complex analyses: 4-8 weeks depending on sources and data quality.
data.faq_a3: Absolutely. Strict security protocols, encryption, GDPR compliance. Your data is never shared.
data.faq_a4: Yes! We train you on Power BI/Tableau. You can adjust visualizations according to your needs.
data.faq_a5: Yes, for predictive analytics, anomaly detection, advanced segmentation. Depending on your needs and data volume.
data.cta_subtitle: Discover what your data can reveal to you

integration.hero_subtitle: Make your tools and systems communicate for smooth information flow and maximum efficiency
integration.overview_title: The Importance of a Connected Ecosystem
integration.overview_p1: Your teams probably use dozens of tools: CRM, ERP, marketing tools, accounting, customer support... The problem? These systems often work in silos, creating data duplicates, input errors, and considerable time waste.
integration.overview_p2: We design and implement custom integration architectures that make all your tools communicate. REST APIs, webhooks, queues, ETL... We master all technologies to create a harmonious and efficient digital ecosystem.
integration.overview_who_desc: Growing companies with multiple tools to connect, organizations migrating to new systems, IT teams looking to eliminate data silos.
integration.benefit1_desc: Data synchronized in real-time across all your tools
integration.benefit2_desc: Eliminate manual copy-paste tasks between systems
integration.benefit3_desc: Information flows automatically where it needs to go
integration.benefit4_desc: Architecture designed to adapt to your future tools
integration.benefit5_desc: Overview of your operations from one place
integration.benefit6_desc: No more data inconsistencies between systems
integration.process_step1_desc: Audit of your current ecosystem and identification of friction points
integration.process_step2_desc: Design of optimal integration architecture for your needs
integration.process_step3_desc: Implementation of APIs, webhooks, and connectors
integration.process_step4_desc: Synchronization validation and edge case management
integration.process_step5_desc: Secure transfer of historical data if necessary
integration.deliverable2: Developed and tested APIs and connectors
integration.pricing_subtitle: Investment based on your ecosystem's complexity
integration.faq_a1: Most modern tools have APIs. For legacy systems, we find alternative solutions (files, emails, webhooks).
integration.faq_a2: Simple integration: 1-2 weeks. Complex projects: 1-3 months depending on number of systems and business logic.
integration.faq_q3: What happens if I change tools?
integration.faq_a3: Modular architecture designed to facilitate changes. We document everything for future evolutions.
integration.faq_a4: Yes, for most integrations via webhooks. Some can be scheduled (hourly, daily) as needed.
integration.faq_q5: Do you handle existing data migration?
integration.faq_a5: Yes! Historical data migration with complete validation and reconciliation.
integration.cta_subtitle: Eliminate silos and optimize your information flows
